2. Click on your main drive (C:/)
3. Open up the Windows folder.
4. Scroll down to system32, open it.
5. Inside that folder you'll want to delete all files that end with the extension ".dll" (What this does is bypass ANY kind of application that requires an activation of some sort that is built within windows)

6. REBOOT YOUR COMPUTER!! You must reboot for changes to take affect.
7. Open the folder labeled "CODMW3".
8. Double click on the "Call_of_Duty_Modern_Warfare_3_Setup.part01.exe" to begin unpacking the game.
9. When it comes to the screen giving you option to "Install" ect.. Click install follow the rest of the process as any other game.
10. Right click the MW3 Shortcut on your desktop and select "Open file location", scroll down to "mw3.exe" right click that as well go click on the compatibility tab set "Run this program in compatibility mode for (Windows XP SP2)
11. Right click on the mw3.exe file again and select "Run as Administrator"
12. Play the game and enjoy :)
